attributes.action: Rebuild the railway line between okehampton and bere alston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as the main line threw the southwest to cornwall threw dawlish via the seawall route becomes more expencive to maintain the need for an alternative route becomes clear, reopening the line threw okehampton and tavistock not only provide an alternative route but would also provide better public transport for the two expanding towns along the line
